name: Camtasia Template
summary: Learn about .CAMTEMPLATE files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Camtasia is available for Windows and macOS and allows you to create various screen-capture videos, such as tutorials, video game recordings, and demonstrations. The software comes with templates, but you can download templates from TechSmith's online library or create your own.

To create a CAMTEMPLATE file with Camtasia, open a project, then select File → Save Project as Template or Export → Template... (macOS version only). After exporting a template, you can share it with other Camtasia users, who can import it into their projects.

instructions: You can open CAMTEMPLATE files with TechSmith Camtasia in Windows and macOS. To open a CAMTEMPLATE file with Camtasia, select File → Import → Template... or select File → New Project From Template.
Camtasia can convert CAMTEMPLATE files to various file types, including the following formats:
You can also export a CAMTEMPLATE file as a .CAMPACKAGE to back up or share resources with other Camtasia users. To do this, select File → Export → Package.
